2000

Kathryn Bigelow

She was the first woman

to win an Academy

Award for Best

Directing in 2010 for

The Hart Locker.

Khloé Zhao

She was the second woman

to win an Academy Award

for Best Directing in 2021

for Nomadland,

eleven years after Kathryn

Bigelow won it.

2021
